text: Sasakiconcha is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Anatomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Sasakiconcha include: * Sasakiconcha elegantissima Geiger, 2006 ==References== * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1-728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History Monographs Number 7 Category:Anatomidae Category:Monotypic gastropod genera
title: Sasakiconcha
